attributes.action: reconsider his position on the release of leadership nomiation papers for the position of Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, as a public, have had no say in the election of the current Prime Minister and by his actions of dismissing our elected MPs we believe that we have the right to state our wish for a leadership challenge ourselves.

By the definition of democracy this is within the public's right to demand.
